title: Will my Nano Sim, Verzion LG-VN220 work in unlocked Pixel 4 ??
content:
I guess I want to be uper'sure all Nano Sims from VZ are created equal !  Want to make the jump to 4xl, and my current FLIP phone (dont laugh) has a Nano Sim...  I think I recall it is based on   'LTE' (so that means I've got some flavor of data plan, I think).

Thanks in advance for your help!
Rich
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
